languages.text: "Надеюсь на пару увлекательных историй по вашему возвращению. Я приберегу к нему бутылочку чего-нибудь особенного".
"I hope to hear a thrilling story or two when you're back. I'll save a bottle of something special for the occasion."
languages.original_text: "Надеюсь на пару увлекательных историй по вашему возвращению. Я приберегу к нему бутылочку чего-нибудь особенного".

traits.locale_text: "I hope to hear a thrilling story or two when you're back. I'll save a bottle of something special for the occasion."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "I hope to hear a thrilling story or two when you're back. I'll save a bottle of something special for the occasion."

languages.text: “希望等您回来的时候，可以给我讲一两个惊心动魄的故事。我会留瓶好酒的，以备不时之需。”
languages.original_text: "I hope to hear a thrilling story or two when you're back. I'll save a bottle of something special for the occasion."

traits.locale_text: “希望等您回来的时候，可以给我讲一两个惊心动魄的故事。我会留瓶好酒的，以备不时之需。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: 「あなたが戻って来た際は、面白い話を沢山聞かせてくださいね。特別なボトルをその時まで保管して、待っています」
languages.original_text: "I hope to hear a thrilling story or two when you're back. I'll save a bottle of something special for the occasion."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたが戻って来た際は、面白い話を沢山聞かせてくださいね。特別なボトルをその時まで保管して、待っています」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: «Espero que vuelva con historias para contar. Guardaré una botella de algo especial para la ocasión».
languages.original_text: "I hope to hear a thrilling story or two when you're back. I'll save a bottle of something special for the occasion."

traits.locale_text: «Espero que vuelva con historias para contar. Guardaré una botella de algo especial para la ocasión».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Ich hoffe, bei Eurer Rückkehr die eine oder andere spannende Geschichte zu hören. Ich hebe einen guten Tropfen für diese Gelegenheit auf."
languages.original_text: "I hope to hear a thrilling story or two when you're back. I'll save a bottle of something special for the occasion."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hoffe, bei Eurer Rückkehr die eine oder andere spannende Geschichte zu hören. Ich hebe einen guten Tropfen für diese Gelegenheit auf."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: « Je compte sur vous pour me raconter vos aventures à votre retour. Je garderai une bouteille au frais pour l'occasion. »
languages.original_text: "I hope to hear a thrilling story or two when you're back. I'll save a bottle of something special for the occasion."

traits.locale_text: « Je compte sur vous pour me raconter vos aventures à votre retour. Je garderai une bouteille au frais pour l'occasion. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Umarım geri döndüğünüzde sizden bir iki heyecanlı hikâye dinleyebiliriz. O gün için kenarda özel bir şişe bekleteceğim."
languages.original_text: "I hope to hear a thrilling story or two when you're back. I'll save a bottle of something special for the occasion."

traits.locale_text: "Umarım geri döndüğünüzde sizden bir iki heyecanlı hikâye dinleyebiliriz. O gün için kenarda özel bir şişe bekleteceğim."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04
